digest_items.title: Enable DNSSEC for your domain
digest_items.why: DNSSEC prevents DNS spoofing attacks by cryptographically signing DNS records
digest_items.fix: Contact your DNS provider to enable DNSSEC and add DS records to your registrar

digest_items.title: Verify SSL certificate validity
digest_items.why: Expired certificates break HTTPS and expose users to MITM attacks
digest_items.fix: Set up automated renewal with Let's Encrypt or monitor expiry dates

digest_items.title: Enable database encryption at rest
digest_items.why: Unencrypted databases are vulnerable if storage media is compromised
digest_items.fix: Enable Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) or equivalent for your database

digest_items.title: Enable audit logging
digest_items.why: Audit logs are essential for incident response and compliance
digest_items.fix: Log authentication events, data access, and configuration changes

digest_items.title: Implement DMARC policy
digest_items.why: DMARC builds on SPF and DKIM to give domain owners control over email authentication

digest_items.title: Verify CORS configuration
digest_items.why: Misconfigured CORS can allow unauthorized cross-origin requests
digest_items.fix: Explicitly whitelist allowed origins instead of using '*'

digest_items.title: Use security champions program
digest_items.why: Embedded security advocates improve security culture across teams
digest_items.fix: Designate security champions in each team and provide training
